member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect
member.summary: Alters the color of an image by rotating its hue values.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Hue rotate effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HueRotationEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the HueRotationEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for HueRotation effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect.Angle
member.summary: Angle to rotate the hue, in radians. Default value 0, range 0 to 2*pi.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect.EffectId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the effect.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1HueRotation GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect.Inputs
member.summary: Gets a collection of inputs attached to the effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect.Properties
member.summary: Gets the collection of properties specific to the current effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of this CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0), and identity transform on the specified drawing session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.HueRotationEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession,Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Matrix3x2)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0) with the specified transform transform on the specified drawing session.
